text: @BorisJohnson Coronavirus update: Wow! I only had that talk with my 3 sons in Queensland, Australia, a few hours ago - on the back of the 2nd Covid outbreak & associated setbacks in Oz. BoJo's summed it up. The "dumbest/woke generation" (not their fault, mind you) must face reality quickly.
